content: I am having some trouble defining the set of numbers from one to N as a DecideableEq. I'd like to index a direct sum by this set and it requires a DecidableEq...
What do you mean by this? Can you post a #mwe?

If you're just doing mathematics and not writing code to be run then you can just use the classical tactic to make everything decidable. But as Eric says, the best way to ask a question here is undoubtedly fully working code rather than a description of what you think you want to do.
Oops, I actually think I was just missing an argument and I'm not getting any errors now. Sorry folks, will certainly just post an MWE in the future.
Noam Kantor has marked this topic as resolved.
